languages.text: "Домин'{name}. В палатах плазмадвигателя я сплела алую сеть, и сообщники Немезита попались в нее. Гадание открыло, что твой исповедник, сеятель веры, оказался лжецом. Неумирающий сказал, что ему — пора".

traits.locale_text: "Эним'{name}. В палатах плазмадвигателя я сплела алую сеть, и сообщники Немезита попались в тиски, как ты того и желал{mf||а}. Гадание над их останками и жертвенной крови открыло передо мной истину: твой исповедник, сеятель веры, оказался лжецом и предателем. Отправимся же в храм — пусть он ответит на наши вопросы. Пусть слова его будут правдивыми словно зеркало, отражающим истину. И когда правда будет раскрыта, пусть он ответит за свои злодеяния. И познает горечь сожаления, которую сам принес в этот мир".

languages.text: "Domin'{name}. I have spun a web of crimson in the plasma drive chambers and ensnared Nemesite's accomplices with it. It is done. My divination has revealed that your confessor, the sower of faith aboard this vessel, is stained with deceit. The Undying One has spoken: his time has come."
languages.original_text: "Домин'{name}. В палатах плазмадвигателя я сплела алую сеть, и сообщники Немезита попались в нее. Гадание открыло, что твой исповедник, сеятель веры, оказался лжецом. Неумирающий сказал, что ему — пора".

traits.locale_text: "Enim'{name}. I have woven a web of crimson in the plasma drive chambers, and Nemesite's accomplices were caught within. My divination has revealed that your confessor, the sower of faith, is stained with deceit. The Undying One has spoken: his time has come."

"Domin'{name}. I have spun a web of crimson in the plasma drive chambers and ensnared Nemesite's accomplices with it. It is done. My divination has revealed that your confessor, the sower of faith aboard this vessel, is stained with deceit. The Undying One has spoken: his time has come."

"Domin'{name}. I have spun a web of crimson in the plasma drive chambers and ensnared Nemesite's accomplices with it. It is done. My divination has revealed that your confessor, the sower of faith aboard this vessel, is stained with deceit. The Undying One has spoken: his time has come."

languages.text: «Domin'{name}. He tejido una red carmesí en las cámaras del motor de plasma y he atrapado en ella a los cómplices de Nemesitio. Está hecho. Mi vaticinio ha revelado que su confesor, aquel que ha de sembrar la fe a bordo de esta nave, ha sido corrompido por la mentira. El Inmortal ha hablado: su hora ha llegado».
languages.original_text: "Domin'{name}. I have spun a web of crimson in the plasma drive chambers and ensnared Nemesite's accomplices with it. It is done. My divination has revealed that your confessor, the sower of faith aboard this vessel, is stained with deceit. The Undying One has spoken: his time has come."

traits.locale_text: «Domin'{name}. He tejido una red carmesí en las cámaras del motor de plasma y he atrapado en ella a los cómplices de Nemesitio. Está hecho. Mi vaticinio ha revelado que su confesor, aquel que ha de sembrar la fe a bordo de esta nave, ha sido corrompido por la mentira. El Inmortal ha hablado: su hora ha llegado».

languages.text: 「ドミン・{name}。私はプラズマ ドライブ室に深紅の網を張り巡らせて、ネメサイトの共犯者を罠にかけたの。もう終わってるわ。ディビネーションの結果、この船の信仰の扇動者である聴罪師は、欺瞞に満ちていることがわかったの。不死の者は告げている。彼の時が来た、と」
languages.original_text: "Domin'{name}. I have spun a web of crimson in the plasma drive chambers and ensnared Nemesite's accomplices with it. It is done. My divination has revealed that your confessor, the sower of faith aboard this vessel, is stained with deceit. The Undying One has spoken: his time has come."

traits.locale_text: 「ドミン・{name}。私はプラズマ ドライブ室に深紅の網を張り巡らせて、ネメサイトの共犯者を罠にかけたの。もう終わってるわ。ディビネーションの結果、この船の信仰の扇動者である聴罪師は、欺瞞に満ちていることがわかったの。不死の者は告げている。彼の時が来た、と」

languages.text: “秘者{name}，我在等离子驱动室里编织了一张血红色的罗网，将涅墨斯特的同伙诱捕其中。狩猎已经结束了，而我的占卜显示：你的告解神父，这艘船上信仰的播种者，遭到了欺骗的玷污。不死之神开了口，他的大限已至。”
languages.original_text: "Domin'{name}. I have spun a web of crimson in the plasma drive chambers and ensnared Nemesite's accomplices with it. It is done. My divination has revealed that your confessor, the sower of faith aboard this vessel, is stained with deceit. The Undying One has spoken: his time has come."

traits.locale_text: “秘者{name}，我在等离子驱动室里编织了一张血红色的罗网，将涅墨斯特的同伙诱捕其中。狩猎已经结束了，而我的占卜显示：你的告解神父，这艘船上信仰的播种者，遭到了欺骗的玷污。不死之神开了口，他的大限已至。”

languages.text: "Domin'{name}. Ich habe ein rotes Netz in den Plasmatriebwerk-Kammern gesponnen und Nemesits Komplizen darin gefangen. Es ist vollbracht. Meine Prophetie hat ergeben, dass Euer Konfessor, der Säer des Glaubens an Bord dieses Schiffes, mit Täuschung befleckt ist. Der Todlose hat gesprochen: Seine Zeit ist gekommen."
languages.original_text: "Domin'{name}. I have spun a web of crimson in the plasma drive chambers and ensnared Nemesite's accomplices with it. It is done. My divination has revealed that your confessor, the sower of faith aboard this vessel, is stained with deceit. The Undying One has spoken: his time has come."

traits.locale_text: "Domin'{name}. Ich habe ein rotes Netz in den Plasmatriebwerk-Kammern gesponnen und Nemesits Komplizen darin gefangen. Es ist vollbracht. Meine Prophetie hat ergeben, dass Euer Konfessor, der Säer des Glaubens an Bord dieses Schiffes, mit Täuschung befleckt ist. Der Todlose hat gesprochen: Seine Zeit ist gekommen."

languages.text: « Domin'{name}. J'ai tissé dans la salle des réacteurs à plasma une toile écarlate dans laquelle j'ai piégé les complices de Némésite. L'affaire est close. La cartomancie m'a révélé que votre confesseur, celui-là même qui est chargé de semer les graines de la foi à bord de ce vaisseau, s'est rendu coupable de fourberie. L'Immortel a parlé : son heure est arrivée. »
languages.original_text: "Domin'{name}. I have spun a web of crimson in the plasma drive chambers and ensnared Nemesite's accomplices with it. It is done. My divination has revealed that your confessor, the sower of faith aboard this vessel, is stained with deceit. The Undying One has spoken: his time has come."

La cartomancie m'a révélé que votre confesseur, celui-là même qui est chargé de semer les graines de la foi à bord de ce vaisseau, s'est rendu coupable de fourberie. L'Immortel a parlé : son heure est arrivée. »

languages.original_text: "Domin'. I have spun a web of crimson in the plasma drive chambers and ensnared Nemesite's accomplices with it. It is done. My divination has revealed that your confessor, the sower of faith aboard this vessel, is stained with deceit. The Undying One has spoken: his time has come."

languages.text: "Domin'{name}. Plazma iticisi odalarında kandan ağ örüp Nemezit'in yardakçılarını yakalamayı başardım. Bu iş bitmiştir. Kehanetim sayesinde öğrendim ki bu gemide imandan sorumlu günah çıkarıcısı, düzenbazlığın lekesini taşıyor. Ölmeyen'in sözü nettir: Zamanı doldu."
languages.original_text: "Domin'{name}. I have spun a web of crimson in the plasma drive chambers and ensnared Nemesite's accomplices with it. It is done. My divination has revealed that your confessor, the sower of faith aboard this vessel, is stained with deceit. The Undying One has spoken: his time has come."
